roleset.name: hold as one's own identity
roleset.note: SELFIDENTIFY-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'identify.01' (from selfidentify.01-v)

roles.note: rel may be hyphenated, single token, or two-token. Concatenate as needed. (from selfidentify.01-v)

role.descr: explicit additional mention of the entity identified

example.name: all args
example.text: Because Brown selfidentifies himself as a Republican, it could make for interesting campaign for conservatives.
